entry.title: #whoami
entry.content:
Hi,

My name is Saman & I am just another Infosec Enthusiast. Here,I am starting this blog to share my research,work and the day to day stuff I work on. I might also share my views on various other stuff happening around. Whatever I state over here are solely my thoughts.

Hope to keep this updated and interesting :)

- SaMaN(@samanL33T)
